DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server v9; © 2004 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Actualiza H_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET. */
INSERT INTO H_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET (id_periodo, afiliado, subnumero, secuencia, id_persona, id_producto_origen, id_plan_origen, id_producto_destino, id_plan_destino, cant_camb_plan_det, id_subproducto_origen, id_subproducto_destino, fecha_inicio_serv, periodo_inicio_serv, periodo_ingreso_salud, fecha_ingreso_sancor_salud, fecha_periodo_actual, fecha_ingreso_segmento_afiliado) SELECT id_periodo, afiliado, subnumero, secuencia, id_persona, id_producto_origen, id_plan_origen, id_producto_destino, id_plan_destino, cant_camb_plan_det, id_subproducto_origen, id_subproducto_destino, isnull(fecha_inicio_serv,'1900-01-01 00:00:00.000') as fecha_inicio_serv, isnull(periodo_inicio_serv, 190001) as periodo_inicio_serv, isnull(periodo_ingreso_salud, 190001) as periodo_ingreso_salud , isnull(fecha_ingreso_sancor_salud,'1900-01-01 00:00:00.000') as fecha_ingreso_sancor_salud, fecha_periodo_actual, fecha_ingreso_segmento_afiliado FROM AUX_H_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server v9; © 2004 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
Declare @Periodo Int Set @Periodo = (select max(id_periodo) FROM AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA)
/* Corrige Fechas */
select * into #TEMPORAL from H_COMP_GRUPO_ACTIVO where id_periodo = @Periodo
UPDATE AUX_H_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET set fecha_inicio_serv = a12.fecha_inicio_serv, fecha_ingreso_sancor_salud = a12.fecha_ingreso_sancor_salud, periodo_inicio_serv = a12.periodo_inicio_serv, periodo_ingreso_salud = a12.periodo_ingreso_salud FROM AUX_H_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET a11 JOIN #TEMPORAL a12 on a11.id_periodo = a12.id_periodo and a11.afiliado = a12.afiliado and a11.subnumero = a12.subnumero and a11.secuencia = a12.secuencia
UPDATE AUX_H_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET set fecha_ingreso_segmento_afiliado = Hc.fecha_ingreso_segmento FROM AUX_H_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET HD JOIN (select id_persona, max(fecha_ingreso_segmento_comercial) as fecha_ingreso_segmento FROM h_comer_stock_afilia (nolock) group by id_persona) HC on HD.id_persona = HC.id_persona Where HD.id_periodo = @Periodo
UPDATE AUX_H_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET SET fecha_periodo_actual = cast(left(id_periodo, 4)+'-'+ right(id_periodo, 2) +'-'+'01 ' as datetime)

component.contactInfo: OLE DB Destination;Microsoft Corporation;Microsoft SqlServer v9; (C) 2005 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;4
component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destinaton. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize
